reviewText: Nice to relive great historic games of the NFL. It's a pity that there are only a few of them...

I love this video it bring back lots of NFL memories and lots of great players during NFL's history.

  Sincerely
  Raphael  Moore Jr
Today I got this the comeback game between buffalo and Houston back in 1993 playoffs. On the cover it said original broadcast network game but its not.its just nfl film highlight. Don't buy this dvd
very happy with seller, will use again!!!
Another oldie but goodie.
I LOVE IT VERY MUCH

great HIGHLIGHTS from game & commentary from Bills veterans but the description states it's 3 hours and the original broadcast. It's not. Fail NFL Films & Amazon.
Lifelong Bills fan and worth $5-$10 but false description...
Great game from the past!
BLU RAY!
I wish the NFL had more videos like this.  I can't find any others that are so readily available.
Thumbs up
Great football dvd
Good product.  Thought it was the original nbc game.
brought back memories.was what i expected.
was what I expected, arrived on time
Was hoping for the full game.  Didn't get it.  OK but still not the complete broadcast.

What a great effort by Cleveland, but better luck for the Broncos. That is until Broncos got massacred by the skins in the superbowl. No biggie Denver's got their share of rings since. Even Cleveland's got a championship now. GO BRONCOS SUPERBOWL 50 CHAMPIONS!!!
great piece of sports history.
Great video
Very disappointed, thought this was the actual game.  Was looking forward to watching the game, not highlights.

This wasn't what I was expecting. I was expecting the full game broadcast, but this is still interesting. It tells the story of the game from the players, coaches and media perspective. It makes it seem as if you are watching the game.
